actionConfiguration.body: SELECT left(update_time,10) as date, count(user_id) as questions_cnt FROM cai_question_logger where DATE(update_time) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 30 DAY) and (question like "%I%" or question like "%O%" or question like "%i%" or question like "%o%" or question like "%量%" or question like "%额%" or question like "%价%" or question like "%产品%" or question like "%行情%" or question like "%期货%" or question like "%期权%") GROUP BY left(update_time,10) ORDER BY left(update_time,10)
